document_data.mainbody:
erath was a city located in central Dambrath.
Located along the Dolphins Climb river just south of the Gnollwatch Mountains, Herath was a bustling city.
Easily the richest city in all of Dambrath, Herath held the nations state mints for electrum and silver coins.
The city sported an army composed of 500 cavalry and 2,500 infantry. They spent much of their time guarding the precious mines that were the lifeblood of the city. In addition to these troops, Duchess Selanith Lbaros had a personal guard of 1,000 gnolls and 40 hill giants.
Nearly all of the dwarves in Dambrath lived in Herath.
